## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.setDragGroupState() method

Sets the active/passive state for the given element(s).You don't need to supply the drag group id, as elements can only be in one drag group anyway.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDragGroupState(state: boolean, ...els: Array<Element>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | boolean | true for active, false for passive. |
|  els | Array&lt;Element&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
